text: 2009–10 PlusLiga was the 74th season of Polish Championship (10th season as professional league - PlusLiga) organized by Professional Volleyball League SA () under the supervision of Polish Volleyball Federation (). Pamapol Siatkarz Wieluń was promoted to PlusLiga in this season. In season 2009/2010 PGE Skra Bełchatów, Asseco Resovia Rzeszów and Jastrzębski Węgiel played in CEV Champions League, ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle and Domex Tytan AZS Częstochowa played in CEV Cup. PGE Skra Bełchatów achieved 6th title of Polish Champion. ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2010–11 CEV Champions League |- |width=10px bgcolor=#bbebff| ||Qualified for the 2010–11 CEV Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#e6f8ff| ||Qualified for the 2010–11 CEV Challenge Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFE7E7| ||Play-offs with the 2nd team of 1st league |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFCCCC| ||Relegation to the 1st league |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=290|Team |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|PGE Skra Bełchatów |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|Jastrzębski Węgiel |- bgcolor=#bbebff | |align=left|Asseco Resovia Rzeszów |- bgcolor=#bbebff |4 |align=left|ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff |5 |align=left|Domex Tytan AZS Częstochowa |- |6 |align=left|Delecta Bydgoszcz |- |7 |align=left|AZS UWM Olsztyn |- |8 |align=left|Pamapol Siatkarz Wieluń |- bgcolor=#FFE7E7 |9 |align=left|Jadar Radom |- bgcolor=#FFCCCC |10 |align=left|Neckermann AZS Politechnika Warszawska |- |} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !2010 Polish Champions |- |PGE Skra Bełchatów 6th title |} {| style="text-align: center; margin-top: 2em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" |- |Maciej Dobrowolski, Mariusz Wlazły (c), Piotr Gacek, Daniel Pliński, Jakub Novotný, Miłosz Hebda, Bartosz Kurek, Filip Frankowski, Miguel Angel Falasca, Stéphane Antiga, Radosław Kolanek, Michał Winiarski, Radosław Wnuk, Igor Walczykowski, Bartosz Cedzyński, Marcin Możdżonek, Michał Bąkiewicz |- |Head Coach |- |Jacek Nawrocki |} ==References== Category:PlusLiga Category:Polish Championship of men's volleyball seasons
